Package uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.front_end

Class CommandLineInterface

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.front_end.CommandLineInterface
public final class CommandLineInterface
extends java.lang.Object
The main command line interface.
Author:
Donal Fellows

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String... args)
      The main command line interface. Dispatches to other classes based on the first argument, which is a command word.
      Parameters:
      args - The command line arguments.

    • dseRun

      public static void dseRun​(java.lang.String machineJsonFile, java.lang.String runFolder, java.lang.Boolean filterSystemCores) throws java.io.IOException, SpinnmanException, StorageException, java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException, java.lang.InterruptedException, DataSpecificationException
      Run the data specifications in parallel.
      Parameters:
      machineJsonFile - Name of file containing JSON description of overall machine.
      runFolder - Name of directory containing per-run information (i.e., the database that holds the data specifications to execute).
      filterSystemCores - If true, only run the DSE for application vertices. If false, only run the DSE for system vertices. If null, run the DSE for all vertices.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If the communications fail.
      SpinnmanException - If a BMP is uncontactable or SpiNNaker rejects a message.
      StorageException - If the database is in an illegal state.
      java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - If there was a problem in the parallel queue.
      java.lang.InterruptedException - If the wait for everything to complete is interrupted.
      DataSpecificationException - If an invalid data specification file is executed.

    • dseAppMonRun

      public static void dseAppMonRun​(java.lang.String gatherersJsonFile, java.lang.String machineJsonFile, java.lang.String runFolder, java.lang.String reportFolder) throws java.io.IOException, SpinnmanException, StorageException, java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException, java.lang.InterruptedException, DataSpecificationException
      Run the data specifications in parallel.
      Parameters:
      gatherersJsonFile - Name of file containing JSON description of gatherers.
      machineJsonFile - Name of file containing JSON description of overall machine.
      runFolder - Name of directory containing per-run information (i.e., the database that holds the data specifications to execute).
      reportFolder - Name of directory containing reports. If null, no report will be written.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If the communications fail.
      SpinnmanException - If a BMP is uncontactable or SpiNNaker rejects a message.
      StorageException - If the database is in an illegal state.
      java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - If there was a problem in the parallel queue.
      java.lang.InterruptedException - If the wait for everything to complete is interrupted.
      DataSpecificationException - If an invalid data specification file is executed.

    • iobufRun

      public static void iobufRun​(java.lang.String machineJsonFile, java.lang.String iobufMapFile, java.lang.String runFolder) throws java.io.IOException, SpinnmanException
      Retrieve IOBUFs in parallel.
      Parameters:
      machineJsonFile - Name of file containing JSON description of overall machine.
      iobufMapFile - Name of file containing mapping from APLX executable names (full paths) to what cores are running those executables.
      runFolder - Name of directory containing per-run information (i.e., the database that holds the data specifications to execute).
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If the communications fail.
      SpinnmanException - If a BMP is uncontactable or SpiNNaker rejects a message.

    • downloadRun

      public static void downloadRun​(java.lang.String placementsJsonFile, java.lang.String machineJsonFile, java.lang.String runFolder) throws java.io.IOException, SpinnmanException, StorageException
      Download data without using data gatherer cores.
      Parameters:
      placementsJsonFile - Name of file containing JSON description of placements.
      machineJsonFile - Name of file containing JSON description of overall machine.
      runFolder - Name of directory containing per-run information (i.e., the database that receives the output).
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If the communications fail
      SpinnmanException - If a BMP is uncontactable or SpiNNaker rejects a message
      StorageException - If the database is in an illegal state

    • gatherRun

      public static void gatherRun​(java.lang.String gatherersJsonFile, java.lang.String machineJsonFile, java.lang.String runFolder) throws java.io.IOException, SpinnmanException, StorageException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Download data using data gatherer cores.
      Parameters:
      gatherersJsonFile - Name of file containing JSON description of gatherers.
      machineJsonFile - Name of file containing JSON description of overall machine.
      runFolder - Name of directory containing per-run information (i.e., the database that receives the output).
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If the communications fail
      SpinnmanException - If a BMP is uncontactable or SpiNNaker rejects a message
      StorageException - If the database is in an illegal state
      java.lang.InterruptedException - If things are interrupted while waiting for all the downloads to be done
